body: Why is it a misuse? I always intended this. The sampler gives the dataset a thing which configures what batch the dataset returns. Usually that means indices into the dataset, but in this case the "batch-index" is just the batch size. I'm keeping the batch index very very general so that people have all the flexibility they need. The same is possible in python since its duck typed
